GSILib.BModel.workers

Class Journalist

  • java.lang.Object
    • GSILib.BModel.Worker
      • GSILib.BModel.workers.Journalist
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XMLRepresentable, java.io.Serializable

    public class Journalist
extends Worker
implements XMLRepresentable, java.io.Serializable
    This is the class Journalist. It represents a worker who writes Document into the system. It has ID, name, birthDate and, especialy, interest.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
